description: Try our easy to follow French Toast with Berries & Maple Syrup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: French Toast with Berries & Maple Syrup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each slice of bread into 3 pieces. In a wide, shallow bowl, lightly whisk the eggs. Add cream and milk and whisk to combine.

Melt half of the butter in a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat until butter is foaming. Dip half of the bread pieces into the egg mixture and lay into the pan. Cook for 1-2 minutes each side until golden. Transfer to plates and keep warm. Repeat with remaining bread.
Layer 3 pieces of toast onto each plate. Top with strawberries and pour over maple syrup.
